Key Match Events: Brahim Diaz scored the winning goal in stoppage time in the 93rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Walid Regragui opted for a comprehensive reshuffle of the starting lineup following the victory against Gabon
Post-Match Reflections: For Walid Regragui, the match against Lesotho served as a warm-up before the tournament’s more challenging matches
Others: Despite a strong overall performance under Regragui’s guidance, the players were unable to fully capitalize on many scoring opportunities
Ayoub El Kaabi nearly achieved a goal in the first half, on a corner kick, but failed to score in the 39th minute
Abdessamad Ezzalzouli missed an open goal in the second half of the match (63rd minute)
